item.title: A Chess Puzzle
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description: How many chess pieces can you place so no piece attacks any other piece?

item.title: The Picture Hanging Puzzle
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description: Can you hang a picture so that it is easy to remove?
